title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not have the expected effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When previewing the PDF, the label does not disappear as expected.
EB: When previewing the PDF, the label should disappear.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property of the label to 'none'.
4. Preview the PDF and verify that the label is no longer visible.
